remarks: Characterize a trinary relationship over a tail Cartesian product. Together with ~ txpss3v , this completely defines membership in a tail cross.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 31-Mar-2012.)
statement:
brtxp.1 $e |- X e. _V $.
brtxp.2 $e |- Y e. _V $.
brtxp.3 $e |- Z e. _V $.
brtxp $p |- ( X ( A (x) B ) <. Y , Z >. <-> ( X A Y /\ X B Z ) ) $.
